unit: Unit 8 | Inference for Categorical Data: Chi-Square
title: Which is Not Random?
question_text: Five situations are described below.  Which one do you think was not a result of chance or random variation?

choices.text: You and 2 2 friends each buy a new tablet and all 3 3 of them turn out to be defective in the same way.
You flip a coin 10 10 times and the result is 9 9 heads and 1 1 tail.
You drive to a store some distance away and you notice that all 12 12 traffic lights you hit were red.
Five consecutive times when you plan to play tennis outside it rains every time.
You and 3 3 friends each by a new fitness watch, all the same brand, and they all work.
